content.text:
# List of presidents of the Democratic Republic of the Congo__disambig_1

This is a list of presidents of the Democratic Republic of the Congo (formerly the Republic of the Congo and Zaire) since the country's independence in 1960.
The current president is Félix Tshisekedi, since 24 January 2019.

id:ind   value:rgb(0.8,0.8,0.8)    legend:None_(Independent)

id:mpr   value:rgb(0.42,0.74,0.32) legend:MPR
id:afdl  value:rgb(0,0.36,0.67)    legend:AFDL

id:udps  value:rgb(0.81,0.06,0.12) legend:UDPS

id:gray2  value:gray(0.95)
DateFormat = dd/mm/yyyy
Period     = from:01/01/1960 till:31/12/+1}}
TimeAxis   = orientation:horizontal
ScaleMajor = gridcolor:gray1 unit:year increment:5 start:1960
ScaleMinor = gridcolor:gray2 unit:year increment:1 start:1960
Legend     = columns:1 left:150 top:35 columnwidth:170

bar:Tshisekedi
from: 24/01/2019 till: $today     color:udps  text:"Félix Tshisekedi"
}}
